Online safety: Children may be exposed to inappropriate content or predators while using digital devices.
Cyberbullying: Children may experience cyberbullying, which can have serious emotional consequences.
Privacy concerns: Children may not understand the importance of protecting their personal information online.
Digital overload: Children may become overwhelmed by the constant flow of information and digital distractions.
Lack of social skills: Excessive screen time can hinder the development of social skills, leading to isolation and decreased interpersonal communication.
